<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","host","database"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"Production Database"},"type":{"type":"string","enum":["postgresql","mysql","mongodb","bigquery","snowflake"],"example":"postgresql"},"host":{"type":"string","example":"db.example.com"},"port":{"type":"integer","example":5432},"database":{"type":"string","example":"analytics"},"username":{"type":"string"},"password":{"type":"string","format":"password"}},"title":"DatabaseConnection"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
